import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset statistics by location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/stats/locations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves asset and ticket statistics grouped by location so you can power dashboards, distribution reports, or inventory health snapshots at the campus/room level.

**Workflow Example**
1. (Optional) Load location metadata: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/view](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-view-v-2) to map `LocationId` values to names.
2. [GET /api/v1.0/assets/stats/locations](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-stats-by-location) to retrieve per-location counts and aggregates.

**Minimal Required Fields**: none.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Statistics retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a list of location statistics","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Statistics about assets and tickets at a specific location","properties":{"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the location"},"OpenTickets":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of open tickets at the location"},"AvailableTickets":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of available tickets at the location"},"TotalTickets":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of tickets at the location"},"TotalAssets":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of assets at the location"},"AssignedUsers":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of users assigned to assets at the location"},"Parts":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of parts in inventory at the location"}},"title":"LocationStat"}},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Pagination details returned with paged user search results.","properties":{"TotalRows":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of rows available across all pages.","example":54343},"PageCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available for the current query.","example":10869},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of records returned per page.","example":5},"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based index of the current page returned in the response.","example":0}},"title":"PagingMetadata"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"LocationStatListResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
